body: Hey Guys And Members Of Avicus this Is just a quick topic to say happy new year! And also ive been temp banned for like 3 days so pvp team I give someone the leadership but I don't know who so below.Don't say yourself say someone who you think will be a good owner for 3 days  and is in the pvp team . The reason I got temp banned was cuz of shooting before walls drop but im sorry staff I wont do it again but 2004Sander Was shooting me before so I shot him cuz he was get on my nerves. But guys hopefully your new years resolutions come true/right or whatever so have a good 2015 And get better at mc :) Jk your all good Bai !
